LanguageData.RIMSPRLab_CancelProjectDesc: Cancels genepack creation. WARNING: All progress and resources will be lost!
LanguageData.RIMSPR_workMultiplierTooltip:
What to multiply the Genetic Value by to determine the work cost of a gene.
Genetic Value is equal to
(C * Cvm + |M| * Mvm + A * Avm)^2
Where:
C = Complexity
Cm = Complexity Value Multiplier
M = Metabolic Efficiency
Mvm = Metabolic Efficiency Value Multiplier
A = Archite Capsules
Avm = Archite Capsules Value Multiplier
LanguageData.RIMSPR_foodMultiplierTooltip:
What to multiply the Genetic Value by to determine the nutrition cost of a gene.
Genetic Value is equal to
(C * Cvm + |M| * Mvm + A * Avm)^2
Where:
C = Complexity
Cm = Complexity Value Multiplier
M = Metabolic Efficiency
Mvm = Metabolic Efficiency Value Multiplier
A = Archite Capsules
Avm = Archite Capsules Value Multiplier
LanguageData.RIMSPR_chemMultiplierTooltip: What to multiply the Genetic Complexity by to determine the chemfuel cost of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_neutroMultiplierTooltip: What to multiply the magnitude of the Metabolic Efficiency by to determine the neutroamine cost of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_architeMultiplierTooltip: What to multiply the Archite Capsules by to determine the archite capsule cost of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_complexValueMultiplierTooltip: What to multiply the Complexity by to determine the genetic value of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_metabolicValueMultiplierTooltip: What to multiply the magnitude of the Metabolic Efficiency by to determine the genetic value of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_architeValueMultiplierTooltip: What to multiply the Archite Capsules by to determine the genetic value of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_workMinTooltip: Minimum work cost of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_foodMinTooltip: Minimum nutrition cost of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_chemMinTooltip: Minimum chemfuel cost of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_neutroMinTooltip: Minimum neutroamine cost of a gene.
LanguageData.RIMSPR_restart_note: Note: All setting changes require a restart to take effect.
